üåå Finora AI Analysis for $HYPE  #HYPEUSDT  | 1h  - The overall trend remains bearish, with price struggling to break above key resistance levels. - Price is currently near the equilibrium of the most recent swing and is facing heavy resistance at 24.780, 25.041, and 25.359, which are likely to act as strong barriers for upward movement. - Unless there is a clear breakout above 25.041 with strong momentum, I expect price to face rejection in this region and move lower toward support at 24.409, then possibly 24.063 and 23.707. - If price sweeps below the most recent swing low near 23.72 and shows a sharp reversal (like a pin bar or bullish engulfing candle on lower timeframes), a temporary long setup could be considered back toward 24.409, but only with confirmation. - As long as price stays below 25.041 and fails to hold above that level with bullish confirmation, my main expectation is for continued downside toward 23.72. - My bias would shift bullish only if price closes decisively above 25.359 and holds...  üìä Get detailed free analysis of any coin on any timeframe you want. $HYPE Technical Outlook (4H)

$HYPE has been in a sustained downtrend, respecting a clearly defined descending channel after rejecting from the major supply zone near the highs. Price is now approaching a strong higher-timeframe demand zone around $18‚Äì$21, a level that previously triggered an aggressive reversal.

This area is critical:

A strong reaction and hold from this demand could mark a trend exhaustion point, opening the door for a relief bounce back toward $30‚Äì$35 and potentially the channel mid/high.

Failure to defend this zone would expose deeper downside, extending the bearish structure.


Until a confirmed break above the channel, this remains a counter-trend bounce setup, not a full trend reversal.

 Trend: Bearish
Key Demand: $18‚Äì$21
Upside on bounce: $30‚Äì$35
 Risk: Demand failure = continuation lower

Hyperliquid ( $HYPE  ) 2025‚Äì2031 Outlook   Hyperliquid isn‚Äôt just another token  it‚Äôs the native asset behind one of DeFi‚Äôs fastest-growing decentralized perpetual exchanges built on its own high-performance Layer 1 blockchain, with deep liquidity, advanced on-chain order books, and sub-second execution.   Price Forecast Highlights (2025‚Äì2031) Experts are projecting a broad long-term uptrend for $HYPE : ‚Ä¢ 2025 potential up to ~$56 ‚Ä¢ 2026 range ~$68‚Äì$87 ‚Ä¢ 2027 could see $100+ ‚Ä¢ 2030 targets nearing $200+ ‚Ä¢ By 2031 some models place HYPE above $230 on average if adoption and liquidity expand.   These projections hinge on continued ecosystem growth, broader DeFi market strength, and real usage rather than just speculation.  Why This Matters Hyperliquid has captured major interest by bridging professional trading features (like deep order books and leverage) with true on-chain transparency. Its native token plays a key role in governance, fee discounts, and staking incentives factors that influence long-term value capture.   Token Metrics Risks to Consider Crypto remains volatile  technical pullbacks, broader market cycles, and execution risks can impact price momentum. Always DYOR and manage risk responsibly.  Whether you‚Äôre a trader, builder, or long-term believer, $HYPE  deserves attention as DeFi infrastructure continues evolving.     #Hyperliquid  #HYPE  #Crypto
